channel.title: DEV.BLOG
channel.description: A blog about updates, features, and random musings.

item.title: Removed Features
item.description: Okay. ANOTHER refresh! Look. I disliked the last refresh, so I changed it all again. Okay, listen up. Change #1: I added a projects section that lists a few of my projects. Change #2: Instead of the jump-to feature for the blog page, I added a table of contents at the very top of the blog page, so you can quickly jump to whichever blog post you want, in seconds. You may have also seen that I changed the layout a bit, with each post having buttons that let you go to the very top, the last post, or the next post. Change #3: Branding. Now, the DEV.() branding still exists, but the website has an additional branding, "Wormhole of Error Dev". Also you may have noticed the color scheme changed. Now it's orange and purple. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Update: So you guys remember the last update, on the 13th right? Yeah well Neocities support FINALLY came back to me, and told me that they found the error and fixed it, so now I've got access to the site again. This is absolutely BRILLIANT NEWS. However, I'm still going to stick with Github, because I'm afraid something like that will happen again, and this time I'm making sure to make local backups all the time. I'm probably going to use the neocities site, for something different.

item.title: Removed Features
item.description: Changelog update! Alright, so it was too much of a hassle to keep the DEV.ARCHIVE...

item.title: Major Update! UI & Features Revamp
item.description: The entire website has now just been revamped! As you can see...

item.title: RSS Feed!
item.description: The blog's RSS Feed has now been fully set up! All blog posts already existing are also added. To add the RSS Feed...

item.title: DEV.ARCHIVE and Jump To Tags!
item.description: Change number UNO: I added a new subwebpage for my website, it's called DEV.ARCHIVE, where I archive a bunch of files and you can download them! Change number DUE: You can now jump to blogposts with tags based on the blog's date! For example, to jump to this blog post...

item.title: In Honour of AStrangeCreature - The Highest Honor
item.description: ok i forgot what i put here so yeh. basically i joined bro's discord and made some fanart and he liked it and made it his PFP and it was the best day of my life. Did i mention my birthday is on the 19th of march?

item.title: Custom URL Redirects!
item.description: I just made a way for me to easily add URL redirections to my website, and it's only accessible to me! So now I can turn any long link (e.g. https://long.link/thats/super#annoying) into a custom url (e.g. https://3rror-dev.github.io/url)! Now ain't THAT cool?

item.title: Created Page 4 a Game
item.description: I just made a website for an alliance I'm in in a game! Recently I've been playing Avatar Legends: Realms Collide a lot, and I've joined this alliance called [OMSH] Secret Tunnels, and after some days, I decided to make a website containing some information to make it more convenient. However, after another member raised the issue of security and privacy, I've now turned the website into a troll page, and if enemy alliances open it, they get rickrolled!

item.title: Separate Blog Page!
item.description: Instead of a blog section which would be too detrimental for me to implement and stuff, I just made this simple blog page with all the blog posts in here. If you want to see the first post, well you better like scrolling... or just use the scrollbar. But not now, 'cause there's only three posts LOL.

item.title: Created a Blog!
item.description: Just added this blog section to the website. Who knew this would be so goddamn detrimental to do? Definitely me.

item.title: Published Site!
item.description: Just finished creating the website, and hosted it on neocities! Let's go!
